basic.description:
An intermediate study that examines how performance shapes our social experiences and lived identities. From the daily acts of self-performance on social media to the `once in a life time¿ performances in the Olympic Games, performance binds contemporary cultural practices, small and large.
NOTE    Students will be required to attend a limited number of Kingston-based cultural productions over the course of the term.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;12G;12Oc;60P)
basic.subject: STSC
basic.title: Media and Performance

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite      Level 3 and registration in an ARTH, ARTV, DRAM, FILM, MUSC or STSC Plan.
